text: The 1995–96 Croatian Football Cup was the fifth edition of Croatia's football knockout competition. Hajduk Split were the defending champions, and the cup was won by Croatia Zagreb. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Round !! Main date !! Number of fixtures !! width=100 | Clubs !! New entries this round |- | First round || First legs 15 and 16 August 1995, Second legs 3 and 6 September 1995 || 32 || 32 → 16 || None |- | Second round || First legs 10 and 11 October 1995, Second legs 24 and 25 October 1995|| 16 || 16 → 8 || None |- | Quarter-finals || First legs 6 March 1996, Second legs 20 and 27 March 1996|| 8 || 8 → 4 || None |- | Semi-finals || First legs 3 April 1996, Second legs 17 April 1996 || 4 || 4 → 2 || None |- | Final || First leg 1 May 1996, Second leg 16 May 1996 || 2 || 2 → 1 || None |- |} ==First round== |} ==Second round== |} ==Quarter-finals== |}
